batchhttp Changelog
===================

1.1.1 (2010-04-20)
------------------

* Fixed compatibility with new versions of httplib2 0.6.0 or greater.

1.1 (2009-11-24)
----------------

* Added batchproxy implementation.
* Fix to support additional HTTP methods (DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD, etc.).

1.0 (2009-09-30)
----------------

* Initial release.
